text: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ

translation.en.sahih: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.
translation.id.indonesian: dan Tsamud, kaum Luth dan penduduk Aikah. Mereka itulah golongan-golongan yang bersekutu (menentang rasul-rasul).
